website_summaries.verdict: For excellent support and protection, go with these boots.
pros: If you need ankle and arch support as well as great control, this is an excellent choice
With Asolo's signature sturdy-yet-lightweight design, these are great for backpacking or day hikes
Water-resistant full-grain leather uppers and Gore-Tex lining
cons: A few customers had the soles of their boots detach after moderate wear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boots i have ever owned. Burned through 2 pair before i realized i could have them re-soled. These things are amazing though. I wear them continuously for 20 days (work) and have no problems. Takes a bit to break in, but when they are wow. Paired with a pair of superfeet insoles, you cant beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FIT, more so that my Zamberlans (which are ...
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT FIT, more so that my Zamberlans (which are also good, but not great). The rollers allow the laces to tighten safely and more securely. These boots are comfortable, and have minimal break-in (if a boot requires "no break-in", that's unusual, not good). A good boot will be stiff at first, and then "mold" to your foot, but should not cause a lot of discomfort either.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: The Asolo Power Matic last seems to fit my foot really well. They are comfortable for me right out of the box. I have another pair of Asolo lighter-weight that don't fit as well. I have high arches, so I added a pair of Sole inserts for even more support. Boots are a hit-or-miss proposition, so I stay with what I know works. These are getting hard to find. I hope that they don't discontinue them. My last pair gave out after about 300 miles of rugged trail, and four seasons of hunting on Kodiak Island. Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ostlund

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from G2 Sports
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from G2 Sports. These boots fell apart in less than six months. Tried to get them to solve the problem because boots have two year warranty. No response. I assume they are not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot and can stand all day
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands second pair. The first pair were worn everyday to work for 3 years. Never had a pair last that long. And the outside of the boots were still good. He loves how comfortable his feet feel even at the end of the workday.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: These are well made boots. I really like the "pulley" eyelets for the laces, it allows you to easily and accurately adjust the snugness of the fit. One caution, they are pretty stiff and need to be broken in. I thought it would be OK to wear them on a 6 mile hike on rough terrain without breaking them in and got a blister on my heel. I've worn them on several hikes since then and they are fine. You should probably wear them around for daily use for awhile before going on a hike.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Shop around first!
customer_reviews.text: Runs small & these aren’t the most comfortable boots out there for the price. Shop around because I found these on sale for about $60 less retail.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I found another pair of the same size and they fit much better. The shoes are great quality
customer_reviews.text: The left foot fit ok the right foot was to small and narrow. I found another pair of the same size and they fit much better. The shoes are great quality, they can be a bit tight so I have found that you may have to try a couple pair of the some size till you get one you like.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Nice details.
customer_reviews.text: Best overall boot Ive toured. Sturdy. Great sole. Buy a half a size bigger. Fits great. Been rough to mine, and they hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kouri

customer_reviews.title: Tough, tough, tough...
customer_reviews.text: I regularly hike in the mountainous region where I live. The terrain can be very diverse. I have used these boots in snow, sand, (long cooled) lava, mud, and on every type rock you can imagine. They are indestructible. The build quality is outstanding. After abusing them every weekend, you can still shine them up to look as new. I will be purchasing another pair some day... assuming my current pair ever dies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have ever had. I use them for hiking, motorcycle boots, working in the yard, events where I am on my feet for long periodd of yime,...everything. This is my 4 th pair.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boots for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking boots for my feet! Love Asolo boots, great quality, rugged, reliable, and keeps feet feeling great when hauling a heavy backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Chieftain

customer_reviews.title: Best boot for your buck
customer_reviews.text: 4th pair of these, usually last roughly 8 years. Best boot for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Asolo boots.They fit well and have that quality tight feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality hiking boots, have already put over 50 hiking miles in them, no Blisters, no breaking in necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot.
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday wear boot. I also walk 3-6 miles a day to exercise me and my dog, and these boots keep my feet feeling great
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Asolo boots are the best. These boots fit perfectly, feel great on, and are rugged! They're well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: doc2

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Pair. Love the boots. Don't expect the soles to last because the Vibram is as thin as shown in the picture...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot!
customer_reviews.text: For the past 5 years I have been using the Asolo Mens TPS 520 GV and recently switched to the Powermatic! THIS IS AN AWESOME BOOT!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of asolo boots and they are the most comfortable footwear I own
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of asolo boots and they are the most comfortable footwear I own. The last 3 pairs were the slightly less expensive brown version with almost identical construction and each pair has lasted for numerous years and none have ever came apart.
customer_reviews.author: David Billins

customer_reviews.title: These are the best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots ever!! I wear them every day for work, farm, fun, hiking and to starbucks :)
customer_reviews.author: Lordaren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shooes are amazing just was to small for me
customer_reviews.author: Ofir pink

customer_reviews.title: but if you want to treat yourself these are the very best
customer_reviews.text: I wear hiking boots every day of the year . There is nothing that compares to these boots . Lots of very good boots out there , but if you want to treat yourself these are the very best
customer_reviews.author: xavier18

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the same ones that I have been using for backpacking for the last 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly stiff and the insoles are paper-thin. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly stiff and the insoles are paper-thin. However, they are extremely waterproof and have already stood up to lots of use. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Hammy713

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for my son at his request after he did an exhaustive internet search for leather hiking boots. He was thrilled to get them and pulled them out of the box immediately to try them on. They fit perfectly and were so comfy. The dark graphite color was true to the picture and very well made. It has been 6 months and he still thanks me for getting them for me. Very happy indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great fit right out of the box. I am a UPS driver and I have been wearing these boot for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: George D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these to work all day every day and has for the last 10+ years!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Somerville

customer_reviews.title: 4x4 HIKING BOOT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Great ankle support when carrying heavy loads. Unbelievable traction walking up, down or sideways. Feet do get a little hot, but that's the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I do extensive outdoor hiking and wilderness travel for photography. A pair of these last 2 years with heavy use. Then the heels are gone. Always comfortable, always water proof. No blisters, no stubbed toes, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: I love them, I wish I had the socks that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them,I wish I had the socks that go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not cheap as you can see. I have to buy quality footwear. I'm considering buying a third pair. They are very sturdy and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: beginw

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than a year; manufacturer and the seller unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Heel counter on both shoes broke down in less than a year; both the manufacturer and the seller were unresponsive. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clynes

customer_reviews.title: Been a great boot so far
customer_reviews.text: Been a great boot so far. I work in the construction industry and need a boot that can preform and withstand the abuse of day to day operations. I believe I have found that with this boot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Asolo Men's Power Matic 200 GV Backpacking Boot
feature_bullets: Made of four different materials (Zinc-alloy, brass, steel, and zamac), the Micro Pulley lacing system offers effortless lacing with maximum durability while remaining extremely lightweight. And because each pulley works independently with reduced lace abrasion, the result is overall improved performance, fit, and comfort. Highly technical and one-of-a-kind, the new Asolo Power Matic sole is comprised of three different PU densities that are co-injected and molded together. The high-density fron
The meaning of "V", "GV" and "GTX" in the Asolo style names: V stands for a Vibram outsole, GV stands for Gore-Tex lining with a Vibram outsole, and GTX is for a GORE-TEX® lining.
2.6-2.8 mm water-resistant full grain leather upper.
